column5: Location at an Affordable Price. Here, You are at The Heart of Dallas . You can walk to Downtown. A mile from Uptown. Less than a mile from the famous bars of Deep Ellum. Famous Restaurants exclusively premiered on the FoodNetworks most viewed programs. The entire Dallas Experience will be enjoyed at this location. In this Cozy home you will have access to a kitchen, state of the arc washer/dryer, living room with smart tv, and of course a cozy corridor for you and your loved one to rest
